subject: docs: align notification documentation with 2-button system
body:
Update documentation to accurately reflect the new 2-button notification
system for web browsers (browser permission + OneSignal subscription).

Changes:
- CLAUDE.md: Document separate buttons for native (1 button) vs web (2 buttons)
- tutorial.ts: Rewrite notification step to clearly explain both buttons
  with visual indicators (ðŸ””/ðŸ”• for browser, ðŸ“¡/ðŸ“´ for OneSignal)
- Clarify that browser permission must be enabled FIRST before OneSignal
- Add icon legend so users understand what each icon state means

All button press handlers verified to show correct contextual messages.
title: align notification documentation with 2-button system
